name: City Interactive Game Data File
summary: Learn about .VBF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Examples of games that store game data in VBF files include the following:
Art of Murder: Cards of Destiny
Art of Murder: Hunt for the Puppeteer
Chronicles of Mystery: The Scorpio Ritual
Chronicles of Mystery: The Tree of Life

description: Game data format used by City Interactive games; contains game data, such as objects, characters, and game audio in a single archive; similar to the .BF format used by Cryo Interactive games.
